Chunk.description: Chunk of the document retrieved by the retriever.

attachment_url.description: URL of the attached document, the chunk belongs to. Exactly matches with the `attachment.url` field in the request.
attachment_url.title: Attachment Url

source.description: Source this chunk belongs to. The source could be a document or some part of the document, like a page or a section.

text.description: Text of the chunk, may be empty, for example, for an image.
text.title: Text

page.description: Page of the document, the chunk belongs to, if applicable.

Chunk.title: Chunk

Image.description: Image related to the retrieved chunk.

data.description: Base64 encoded image data in image/png format.
data.title: Data

mime_type.description: MIME type of the image. Only image/png is supported for now.
mime_type.title: Mime Type

Image.title: Image

number.description: Page number in the document, 1-based (i.e. the same as in the page fragment of the URL).
number.title: Number

image_index.description: Index of the image of the document page in the `images` list, 0-based.
image_index.title: Image Index

Source.description:
Source of the chunk, intended to show the user where the chunk comes from.
The source could be a document or some part of the document, like a page or a section.

url.description: URL for the source. The URL could have a fragment to indicate a specific part of the document, like a page number (for example, #page=3).
url.title: Url

display_name.description: Human-readable name of the source (the same that Dial RAG displays in the stages).
display_name.title: Display Name

Source.title: Source

description: Results of the Dial RAG retrieval process.

chunks.description: List of chunks found by retriever in the order of their relevance.
chunks.title: Chunks

images.description: List of images related to the chunks.
images.title: Images

title: RetrievalResults
